name: A Kings Journey
description:
Overview
  • A Short 2D turn based random combat game.
  • This game was made for a 48 hour gamejam hosted by GMTK.
Goal
  • The goal is to defeat each enemy to progress through the game and reach the kings scepter to win.
Backstory
  • Roll is the king of Dicelandia, and he has embarked on an adventure to recover his lost scepter. This is his journey…
Features
  • Randomized values for healing, damage and gold.
  • 4 battle levels with different enemies in each level.
  • 1 merchant level for buying healing or ability potions to restore ability uses.
Credits
  • Ryan Beattie
    • Programming
    • Game Design
  • Ethan Snyder
    • Game Design
    • Artist
References/Credits for Assets used
  • Kenney Fonts by Kenney.nl
  • Cash Register (Kaching) - Sound Effect (HD) by Gaming SFX
  • Punch Sound Effect - Gaming SFX by Gaming SFX
  • Player Heartbeat Sound Effect by CPhT Fluke
  • Epic Battle Music (No Copyright) "Dragon Castle" by @Makai Symphony & BreakingCopyRight - Royalty Free Music
  • Free Background Music For Youtube Videos No Copyright Download for Content Creators by Background Music Without Limitations
